bill.summary:
Public Service Loan Forgiveness Inclusion Act of 2017
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise the public service loan forgiveness program by expanding the types of payments made by public service employees for Federal Direct Loans that qualify as repayment plans under the program.
